title: After Fighting Crime, Ex-Guatemala Attorney General Moves To U.S.
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to Claudia Paz y Paz who scored convictions against organized crime and an infamous ex-general. Paz y Paz overhauled a prosecutor's office in a country better known for corruption.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
